solution_line_template: On Monday the total number of miles Alice walks to and from school is {miles_to_school} + {miles_from_school} = <<{miles_to_school}+{miles_from_school}={daily_miles_monday}>>{daily_miles_monday} miles.

For the other {remaining_days} days, from Tuesday to Friday, she walks an additional {remaining_days} * {daily_miles_monday} = <<{remaining_days}*{daily_miles_monday}={miles_other_days}>>{miles_other_days} miles
The total number of miles she will have walked by Friday {daily_miles_monday} + {miles_other_days} = <<{daily_miles_monday}+{miles_other_days}={total_miles_week}>>{total_miles_week} miles
